name: iMonster Ai
description: The Monster project is an innovative AI-driven trading platform designed for cryptocurrency traders. It provides users with personalized buy and sell signals based on their defined trading strategies. The project operates on the Smart Chain blockchain and offers a Telegram bot for easy access and interaction. Users can earn project tokens through tasks such as social media engagement and referring friends. Additionally, there is a fun feature where users can gain rewards by guessing the price of Bitcoin in the next minute, making the trading experience engaging and rewarding.
